column2: "I'm sorry for always doing this. Maybe it's sneaky to say this at this point, but isn't the Rockbear brutal?"

"But I know you can take one down. That's
why I asked you in the first place. How could
I possibly ask anyone else?"

"Just don't push your luck. I'd hate for
anything bad to happen to the best
ingredient gatherer in the universe!"

"いつもいつも悪いわね。
今さらこんなこと言うのズルいけど
ロックベアって凶暴なんでしょう？"

"もちろん、あなたなら仕留められると
思うからこそ頼んでるんだけど。
他の人に頼めるわけないじゃない！"

"無理なら無理で
仕方ないと思ってるから。
ほどほどにね。"
